channel.title: Glossary
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Glossary" - I have started a Glossary Page

item.title: Re: Glossary
item.content:encoded:
str - Strength
suc - Success(es)
RXP - Ranking XP
RE - RedEye (can be jutsu or bloodline)
WE - WhiteEye (can be jutsu or bloodline)
FTGT - Flying Thunder God Technique
Run - An attempt to get as much RXP as possible in one session (ex. Jonin Run, Sanin Run), usually requiring a lot of preparation beforehand for purposes of achieving the higher ranks
Pots - Potions. One-Use Items, usually created in the Potion Palace.
RTW - Road to Womanhood

item.title: Re: Glossary
item.content:encoded:
CLT = Crazy Love Triangle
NSY = Never Say Yaoi

here are a couple

item.title: Glossary
item.content:encoded: I have started a Glossary Page to collect the most used terms, acronyms and abbreviations, etc., related to BvS. The Page is found here (http://bvswiki.com/guide:glossary). Personly I'm not specialy good at this field (why I created the page), but please let the terms, acronyms and abbreviations (etc.), be BvS RELATED. I hope many can help to fill the page, and that many can get the use of it.
